function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about future vector dynamics and disease ecology","Impact":"Difficulty in targeting high-risk geographical areas for community-based interventions, leading to ineffective control of VBDs","Mitigation":"Investing in collecting detailed local and national level entomological, incidence, and prevalence data","Technologies":"Advanced data collection technologies for entomological and disease data","People":"Local communities, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, research organizations"},{"Description":"Risk from other vector illnesses if WHO targets for controlling VBDs are not met","Impact":"Increased risk of other vector-borne illnesses globally","Mitigation":"Continuing and expanding efforts to meet WHO targets for VBD control","Technologies":"Advanced disease control technologies and interventions","People":"Global population, public health agencies","Owner":"Global health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of community-based studies for mitigating the effects of climate change on VBDs","Impact":"Limited knowledge of local perspectives on mitigating climate change effects on VBDs","Mitigation":"Conducting more community-based studies to understand local perspectives on VBD control and climate change adaptation","Technologies":"Community-based research methods, data collection technologies","People":"Local communities, public health agencies","Owner":"Research organizations, public health agencies"}]}
